Detailed Description

Base exception class. For generic exceptions.

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

bool  print = true,
std::ostream &  stream = std::cerr 
)

Constructor for Exception class.

Parameters:
msg The message to print/store.
print Set to true if you want to print the message to stream. Default is true.
stream The stream to print msg to. Default is std::cerr.

Member Function Documentation

void print (  ) 

Prints the stored message to the stream passed in the constructor, or to another stream if specified.
